outline:
1. to narrow, form, nip, pinch, squeeze, wink, purse
    1. (Qal) to pinch
    2. (Pual) to be nipped or pinched off, be formed
strongs_def: to pinch, i.e. (partially) to bite the lips, blink the eyes (as a gesture of malice), or (fully) to squeeze off (a piece of clay in order to mould a vessel from it)
